alert.note: Alert for Winston (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued January 01 at 5:07PM CST until January 01 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 PM CST FOR SOUTHEASTERN OKTIBBEHA AND NORTHEASTERN WINSTON COUNTIES... At 507 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Craig Springs, or 12 miles southwest of Starkville, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Longview around 515 PM CST. Starkville and Oktoc around 520 PM CST. Sessums around 525 PM CST. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CST for central, northeastern and east central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
